quickTips.title: Inama z'Ingenzi
quickTips.subtitle: Uko wakoresha scanner
quickTips.step1: Huza scanner y'ibirango cyangwa ukoreshe kamera yawe
quickTips.step2: Skena ibirango by'igicuruzwa cyangwa code ya QR
quickTips.step4: Komeza wjiza cyangwa ukura mu bikoresho

scanMobile.title: Skena ukoresheje Telefone
scanMobile.subtitle: Erekereza kamera ya telefone yawe kuri QR code cyangwa barcode kugira ngo ukore igikorwa cyo gusohora ibikoresho vuba.
scanMobile.tip1: Fungura porogaramu ya telefone ujye mu gice cya scanner.
scanMobile.tip2: Erekereza kamera kuri QR code cyangwa barcode uretse yibonere neza.
scanMobile.tip3: Iruka ko hari urumuri ruhagije kandi wirinde urumuri rwinshi ku birango.
scanMobile.tip4: Niba uskena barcode, uyishyire neza mu buryo buryamye mu kirahure cya kamera.
